name: com.unity.ai.assistant
description:
Use AI for project-aware information retrieval, troubleshooting, code generation, assistance, and scene editing.

Ask
Solve hard problems or get ideas for your project. Assistant provides you with relevant answers based on the context of your project.

Run
Automate actions in the Editor to tackle repetitive tasks and streamline workflows. Use natural language to scatter objects across terrain, adjust lighting, rename assets, restructure project files, and more.

Code
Reduce the time and effort required to structure gameplay mechanics by using Assistant to create pre-compiled scripts.

_upm.changelog:
- Return enter cancels prompt and resends it
- Fix code edit temp file
- Check for unauthorized code before loading the assembly
- Support function calling during streaming
